document.full_text: apple inc sued samsung electronics claiming the south korean firm's galaxy line of mobile phones and tablets "slavishly" copies the iphone and ipad, according to court papers, a move analysts say is aimed at keeping its close rivals at bay.
document.title: apple sues samsung, says stop copying us
lines_and_colors: apple inc sued samsung electronics claiming the south korean firm's galaxy line of mobile phones and tablets "slavishly" copies the iphone and ipad, according to court papers, a move analysts say is aimed at keeping its close rivals at bay.
